content: The UVa CS Department seeks tenured/tenure-track faculty applicants, at all levels of seniority, in programming languages and/or compilers (among other areas). Our official ad is posted at CRA, here: https://cra.org/job/uva-engineering-computer-science-university-of-virginia-open-rank-tenured-or-tenure-eligible-position-in-computer-science/. Feel free to let me know by email to sullivan@virginia.edu if you or your colleagues have graduating PhD students who might be interested. If you're an accomplished more seniorÂ researcher who might conceivably be interested, you may let me know (maybe send a CV) in confidence.
